title: Flipped Learning and LMS-Integrated Instructional Design for Digital Transformation in Islamic Religious Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core Islamic doctrines and foundational educational knowledge
context.additional_context: Focused on designing and applying an educational model that combines digital tool utilization skills with the preservation of Islamic values for in-service practitioners.

learning_goals: Designing Islamic religious education content using flipped learning and LMS.
Applying a digital ethics filtering system suitable for the AI era to instructional design.
Developing teaching-learning strategies that structure learning activities based on Islamic values.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
